page.title: 10RED FUNNEL FERRIES COWES
page.content: { Red Funnel Ferries}operate the only ferry service{between Southampton and {Cowes.}They carry up to 800 passengers and 80 cars on each crossing and almost 1\ million passengers each year.The trip takes 1 hour and costs Â£3.00 day return.The boats travel at 14 knots.Each ferry has 10 crew members and 3-6 catering staff. Red Funnel also operate a{Hydrofoil {Service between Southampton and West {Cowes}which takes 20 minutes on a single trip and costs Â£4.40 day return.The hydrofoils are serviced by Groves and Guttridge.2 engineers,3 painters,2 boat builders are employed for two weeks on each of the 4 Shearwaters.Engine repairs are carried out in Jersey.{The Hydrobus}has been introduced in 1985 to improve the service{between Cowes and Newport.
